name: Voltflux
description: Voltflux is a sleek and sophisticated oscilloscope-themed robot, sporting a shiny black box with classic buttons and arms resembling those of a soldier. Its screen displays a timeless design, while its stylish shades add a touch of flair to its overall appearance. Voltflux is a valued member of the WebtrES club, using its advanced technological capabilities to analyze and visualize electronic waveforms with precision and efficiency.
